communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request the release of any and all records pertaining to my placement on the watchlist supported by the United States Department of Homeland Security, Federal, State, Local, Tribal, and Territorial law enforcement (F/SLTT), as well as private sector partners including the National Guard and fusion centers. 

I understand that the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) provides the public with the right to request access to federal agency records, and I am seeking transparency and clarity regarding my status on the aforementioned watchlist. As such, I request all documents, communications, reports, or any other records that pertain to my inclusion on this watchlist.

It has come to my attention for 6 years now, that my inclusion on the watchlist has been exploited by individuals within the operation, and therefore, I am requesting your timely attention to this matter.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alexandra Collins

title: Alexandra Collins FOIA (Granite City Police Department)

title: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: STL Fusion Center FOIA

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any/All records concerning Alexandra Diane Collins, D.O.B. 11/26/1991, currently located at 2432 Missouri 
Avenue, Granite City, Illinois 62040-2013, and once located at 5023 Elenore Avenue, Apt. 1N., St. Louis, Missouri 63116-
1356.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alexandra Collins
